titleStmt.title: The cry of blood; or, the horrid sin of murther display'd. In the true relation of three several murthers committed within the compass of one week viz. of Capt. Campbell on the 4th. Mr. - a beadle in the Strand, on the 6th. and of Mr. Baker, commonly call'd Capt. Baker, on the 7th of this instant Aprill, 1692. With a particular account of the circumstances of each tragical accident.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Randal Taylor, near Stationers-Hall,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Newberry Library.
